subject: Re:  New Members/thanks Misty
author: lunalamia
full_text:
Just got this after I posted.
Thank you Misty...switching over to individual emails to get the links 
for evp sound files.

~ Laura (Lunalamia = yahoo)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> Hello to everyone that is joining our group. Feel free to jump in on 
the conversations, ask questions or just look around. For those of you 
who would like to see what people are up to you may want to set your 
group settings to "individual email" settings for the postings 
otherwise you will not recieve message attachments of thier evp sound 
files. Most file sharing is done this way here.
>    
>   Misty
